node.html:
Description

Chaotic system is exteremely sensitive to initial conditions. A chaotic system is not actually random, if we give enough time to system we can actually predict the deterministic behaviour of the system.

The link for source code is availabe at Chaos_System

frontmatter.title: Understanding Chaos theory using double pendlum experiment
frontmatter.author: Aarif Malik
frontmatter.desc: A simple explanation of chaos system works.
